statements: DELETE FROM adult_learners WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor' AND age > 25;
DELETE FROM adult_learners_demographics WHERE learner_id = 123 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM learning_preferences WHERE preferred_subject = 'Math' AND preferred_learning_time = 'Evening';
DELETE FROM adults_demographics WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM learning_preferences WHERE preferred_subject = 'Math' AND preferred_learning_mode = 'Online'
DELETE FROM assessments WHERE learner_id = 101 AND assessment_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM enrollment WHERE program_id = 105 AND enrollment_status = 'Active';
